text: David Eugene Price (born August 17, 1940) is an American politician. He was the U.S. Representative for from 1997 to 2023, previously holding the position from 1987 to 1995. He was a member of the Democratic Party. In October 2021, Price announced that he would be retiring from Congress in 2022. ==References== ==Other websites== *Congressman David Price official U.S. House website *Price for Congress * Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from North Carolina Category:Politicians from Tennessee Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: David Price (politician)
